name: Garbage John
description:
Garbage John is about trash, but it's also about love, compassion and struggle for life.

Features
  • Only one boss to make you angry;
  • Amazing 2 FPS cutscenes;
  • Amateur voice acting to blow up your eardrums;
  • Responsive controls.
Controls
  • Use W, A, S, D to move Garbage John;
  • Move mouse to aim and use left mouse button to shoot;
  • Press ESC at any moment to quit this trash game.
Credits
